goal.ch: 從研讀《存有與虛無》來探討沙特的哲學人類學
goal.en: To investigate Sartre’s Philosophical Anthropology by studying Being and Nothingness

outline.ch:
何為人？人類如何有別於其他的物種？哲學人類學嘗試以哲學的方式來區別及界定人類的特徵。其實所有的哲學都是某種對於人類觀點的主張。沙特是存在主義與法國現象學的領頭人物，其思想受到胡賽爾及海德格的哲學影響甚鉅。本門課程將以閱讀《存有與虛無》、報告及討論的方式，來嘗試了解沙特的哲學對人類的理解有何主張。

outline.en:
What is man? How could human beings be different from other species? Philosophical anthropology tries to distinguish and define the characteristics of mankind. In fact, every philosophy is some kind of position concerning the human image. Sartre is a leading figure of Existentialism and French Phenomenology, his thought is deeply influenced by Husserl’s and Heidegger’s philosophy. This course will explore Sartre’s philosophy concerning his view of humanity by reading, presenting and discussing Being and Nothingness.
